text: <@U02C2ELN0TT> has joined the channel
<@UHZ7J70DN> en <@U0D6EPESC> hi guys, hereby a first look of the poster, please give your feedback, both on text and graphic design
I am okay with the general setup :grinning:
I hope Marije enjoyed our talk, we definitely did!
That’s a good one, I’ll include that. If you’re ok with the general setup than I’m gonna send it to the graphic designer and than we can work some more on the text in the mean while
I like the poster very much. Under the Voor Wie - i think we need to emphasis something about the open to all, regardless of education, age, etc because that is also what really makes us different
i am going to look at the poster now, as soon as I listen to someone's very exciting news about her interview :wink:
In the meantime... I sketched the poster, curouis about what you think of it (before we send it to the graphic designer)
<@UHZ7J70DN> This sounds like a lot of bullsh*t indeed! We quickly send an email yesterday to ask them why they did not tell us this before

It will be interesting to see what the letter says. I think it is very short sighted and it makes me even more determined to offer the middle finger salute and make sure that we have a financially independent focus and future. :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
In the meantime, I agree with <@UHZ7J70DN> about the poster!
Have some more thoughts about them following the procedure, etc, but I’ll keep them to myself until we have received the actual letter.
<!channel> urghh... what! Couldn’t they have said that in the meetings that we had with them before we actually submitted the proposal?
I definitely think we should go forward with the poster - since I will still push on with the Wethouder. And we are going to keep going with what we are doing.

Urgh... i just got called by the Gemeente Rotterdam and we have been removed from the City Labs 010 subsidy program for the following reasons: our plan is not new - this has been tried by other groups and they have not succeeded, they are not convinced that we really offer gelijke kansen, they have doubts over whether or not we can actually find people jobs with these skills especially if they have been unemployed and since most companies in Rotterdam will not offer paid traineeships, they don't think we will be able to either. I will get a full letter with all of the text but these were the four.
Positieve reacties en fans...dat moeten we hebben. Dank voor delen Marieke!

<!channel> Hoi iedereen, ik sprak van de week iemand van de gemeente die bij citylab zit. En zij had al gehoord van het gezamenlijk ingediende plan door DoGoodOnly en Offcourse en ze klonk positief. Dus dat is alvast een goed begin!
Thanks for al the hard work everyone!! fingers crossed and :champagne::champagne::champagne:
:champagne::champagne::champagne::champagne::champagne::champagne::champagne::champagne::champagne:

Just to let you know, the city's portal crashed a few times. :wink: However, our proposal is in!!! So now the wait until November for the outcome! Thank you again, Norbert and Marieke for your dedication and thoroughness!

Hi All - I think we need to come up with a different title than Gelijke kansen - uit de bijstand. Not everyone is in the bijstand. And we want to encourage reskilling and upskilling. Longevity to round two means that we will need to have employed people as well.

<@UJDDBD938> Hoi Norbert, wat heb je ontzettend veel werk verzet voor de aanvraag van Citylab. Het ziet er goed uit. Ik lees er nu ook even doorheen vanuit de bril van de lezer (lees: de bewoners van rotterdam) en zet hier en daar nog een paar opmerkingen

<@UFYGTT2VB> we would also need to add the following to the budget - which I would love to get sponsored by a company or the gemeente. LinkedIn training for our participants. It's 3500 ex BTW per group of 20.
<@UHZ7J70DN>  great Caroline, thanks for the comments, I will check it this afternoon
I added some comments to the current document- particularly in the budget area and made some small edits.
Ik bel je met 10 minuten even
<@UJDDBD938> laten we dat doen, ik stond ook op het punt even met jullie contact op te nemen hierover
Hi Marieke, zullen we even bellen over het Project Voorstel document.. mijn nummer is 0638 578 295

attachments.title: Mid-Career Professionals Look for a Reboot at Coding Boot Camps

text: <https://www.groene.nl/artikel/het-onderwijs-dreigt-zijn-doel-en-relevantie-te-verliezen>

attachments.title: ‘Feitenkennis voldoet niet meer’, weet OESO-directeur Andreas Schleicher. ‘We moeten sociaal gedrag meetbaar maken’
attachments.text: Andreas Schleicher leidt het OESO-onderzoek naar de ontwikkeling van emotionele en sociale vaardigheden bij de jeugd. Simpele feitenkennis in het onderwijs, voorheen de snelste weg naar succes, voldoet niet meer.
attachments.fallback: De Groene Amsterdammer: ‘Feitenkennis voldoet niet meer’, weet OESO-directeur Andreas Schleicher. ‘We moeten sociaal gedrag meetbaar maken’

text: Maar de oeso is bezig de steven te wenden. Er komt meer aandacht en waardering voor ‘zachtere’ competenties, zoals aanpassingsvermogen, creativiteit, volharding, empathie. Die capaciteiten worden belangrijker in een wereld die snel verandert en complexer wordt, terwijl simpele feitenkennis juist aan waarde inboet. Goed onderwijs kan eigenlijk niet meer zonder educatie in sociale en emotionele vaardigheden, vindt de oeso.
Perhaps of add value..onderbouwing ... to the CityLab Project Document...

text: Hi Marieke and Jan Hein. I was at the Restart Network graduation last night and Nancy from Gemeente Rotterdam came up to me to talk about digital inclusion. She was curious to know what we did on that level. So I talked a little bit about the SkillsUP Lab data program that we will start on 1 July and that we are working with you to plan out a dev program as well. She was pretty excited and mentioned that she was meeting with or talking with you on Monday. Also, Dhiem from CodeGorilla in Groningen called me yesterday to talk about working together. We're going to talk with each other on Monday so I will have an update for you Tuesday when we see each other!
